events.message: I was involved in a car accident yesterday afternoon, resulting in significant damage to my vehicle and minor injuries. I am filing this claim to request assistance with repairs and medical expenses.
The claim has been reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident based on the reported car collision and the descriptions of damages and injury.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle this case and will follow up with the claimant regarding the next steps and required documentation.
We acknowledge receipt of your auto accident claim and will begin processing your request promptly to assist with settlement and repairs.
Please provide the police report, photos of the damage to your vehicle, medical reports related to your injury, and insurance documents for further assessment.
The claimant has submitted all requested documents including the police report, detailed photos of the vehicle damage, medical bills, and prior insurance proof.
Our investigation team has commenced a thorough review of the submitted documents and the circumstances surrounding the car collision incident.
The investigation has been completed confirming the claim details and verifying the extent of the damage and medical treatment costs.
A settlement amount has been proposed based on the evaluation of vehicle repair costs and medical expenses incurred due to the accident.
The claimant has expressed satisfaction with the prompt handling of the claim and the proposed settlement amount appears fair and acceptable.
The claim has been officially approved, authorizing payment to cover the necessary vehicle repairs and outstanding medical bills.
Payment has been issued to the claimant and the repair shops based on the agreed settlement covering all verified expenses.
The claim has been successfully closed following the full payment and completion of vehicle repairs and medical treatments.
All claim documents and case details have been archived securely for record-keeping and future reference if necessary.
